title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Special: Nekogoroshi-hen
original_name: ひぐらしのなく頃に 猫殺し編
opening_song: "Higurashi no Naku Koro ni" by Eiko Shimamiya
ending_song: "Why,or why not" by Hiroyuki Oshima feat. Rekka Katakiri
sinopse: After losing a bet, Keiichi, Mion, Rena, Satoko and Rika parade around the town in costumes. When they come to a fork in the road, they decide to go to Yagouchi, a nearby abandoned village. Once there Keichii and Rena learn the mystery of a strange haunted quarry as they debate whether or not to check it out.
